posts.post_title: FS: Joe Tinker Bat On Shoulder Cycle 460 PSA 2
posts.post_content: Asking TRADED for Tinker. Shipping is $8.95 USPS First Class. Please PM me with questions or for additional photos. Thanks for your interest!
Very bold back, and perfectly centered. GLWS.
Appreciate the comment NYC, thank you. Bump with price drop.
